alert.note: Alert for Clay; Fentress; Overton; Pickett (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 06 at 2:28PM CDT until May 06 at 3:15PM CDT by NWS Nashville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Nashville has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Overton County in Middle Tennessee... Pickett County in Middle Tennessee... Northeastern Clay County in Middle Tennessee... Northwestern Fentress County in Middle Tennessee... * Until 315 PM CDT. * At 228 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 10 miles south of Celina to near Livingston, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Livingston, Jamestown, Byrdstown, Pall Mall and Standing Stone State Park. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 700 PM CDT for Middle Tennessee.
